divs: Sighting DetailsMy 12 year old son was sitting in my truck which is back in the drive way faceing east,Says he witness a blue hazy ball of light floting about 3 feet off the ground come out of nowhere,and race down the street,and around the cornor. Now I know one thing in my 42 years of life is that, THAY DON'T LIKE COLD WEATHER? THAT'S ALL I'M GOING TO SAY ABOUT THAT.
Summary: blue ball about half the size of car.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Saginaw
There were no other sightings in Saginaw on or around July 25th 2008
